item.title: Martha add a quote by Martha Ramirez
item.description:
"Dreams do come true I promise this to you
Faith is all you need and to believe is all you do" -- Martha Ramirez

item.title: Martha add a quote by Trisha Yearwood
item.description: "What's meant to be will always find a way" -- Trisha Yearwood

item.title: Martha add a quote by Lou Holtz
item.description: "It's not the load that breaks you down, it's the way you carry it." -- Lou Holtz

item.title: Martha add a quote by Lance Armstrong Sally Jenkins
item.description: "Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever." -- Lance Armstrong Sally Jenkins

item.title: Martha add a quote by George Herman Ruth
item.description: "It's hard to beat a person who never gives up." -- George Herman Ruth

item.title: Martha add a quote by Jack London
item.description: "You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club." -- Jack London

item.title: Martha add a quote by Vanna B.
item.description: "You can't truly appreciate the top if you've never hit rock bottom." -- Vanna B.

item.title: Martha add a quote by Jo Linsdell
item.description: "A writer who can't follow submission guidelines is like a pilot without a plane... ain't gonna get very far!" -- Jo Linsdell

item.title: Martha add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Words are easy, like the wind; Faithful friends are hard to find." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Martha add a quote by John Holmes
item.description: "There is no exercise better for the heart than reaching down and lifting people up." -- John Holmes

item.title: Martha add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "Love is always patient and kind. It is never jealous. Love is never boastful or conceited. It is never rude or selfish. It does not take offense and is not resentful. Love takes no pleasure in other peopleâ€™s sins, but delights in the truth. It is always ready to excuse, to trust, to hope, and to endure whatever comes." -- Anonymous

item.title: Martha add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you don't have, you will never, ever have enough" -- Oprah Winfrey
